QuestData.Title: From the Shadows
QuestData.Description: He turned into one of them... didn't he? How do we even begin to fight an enemy that can do this to us?$B$BMy father's arsenal's certainly a good start, I suppose.$B$BWorgen are hiding in the alleys ahead. Take one of my mastiffs to find them more easily.$B$BWe're going to need to clear the way ahead if we're going to move these cannons above ground.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. I'll start rounding up some help to get these cannons positioned.
